title: Amazon is suing more than 1,000 people for posting fake reviews
text:
Amazon is suing more than 1,000 people for posting fake reviews 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Amazon is going on the offensive against fake reviews, filing a lawsuit against more than 1,000 people who allegedly asked for money to post...
